modName: Crazy Vaclavs Exploding Ammo and Archery
summary: Crazy Vaclav has snuck past customs and imported his explosive archery ordinance.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=+3][color=violet][b]Crazy Vaclav's Exploding Ammo and Archery[/b][/color][/size][/center]
[center][color=DeepPink][i]New version 4.1 is now available - explosive Arrows AND Bolts for the holidays![/i][/color][/center]
[center][color=DeepPink][i][b]*** now requires Dawnguard DLC ***[/b][/i][/color][/center]


From lands beyond Elswyr, Crazy Vaclav has imported his favorite exploding arrows, bolts, and archery ordinance.

Whether you are looking for some clean, harmless, family-oriented fun with ranged high explosives; or looking to have some extra tools for those tricky situations, Crazy Vaclav has you covered!

This mod adds a number of creative magical items focusing on explosive archery. The mod is intended to be somewhat balanced yet add an element of fun to your explorations.

[color=Aquamarine][i]If you enjoy this mod, please take a moment to endorse it! Happy Hunting![/i][/color]


[size=+1][u][b]Magical Arrows and Bolts[/b][/u][/size]

Arrows and Bolts of Fire (Lesser and Greater)
- For a single target, immediate and lingering fire damage with a chance to stagger.

Arrows and Bolts of Frost (Lesser and Greater)
- For a single target, Immediate and lingering frost damage to health and stamina with a chance to slow.

Arrows and Bolts of Shock (Lesser and Greater)
- For a single target, Immediate and lingering shock damage to health and magicka with a chance to stagger.

Arrows and Bolts of Force (Lesser and Greater)
- For a single target, staggers with a chance to knock down and throw the target back.

Arrows and Bolts of Absorb Lifeforce (Lesser and Greater)
- For a single target, absorbs health, stamina, and magicka transfers it to yourself.

Arrows and Bolts of Paralyzation (Lesser and Greater)
- For a single target, paralyze.

Arrows and Bolts of Soul Trap (Lesser and Greater)
- For a single target, traps the soul and fills a soul gem if the target dies within a time period.

Arrows and Bolts of Holy Smiting (Lesser and Greater)
- For a single undead target, staggers and damages undead with a holy fire. Also turns undead.

Arrows and Bolts of Holy Wrath
- Explodes in with an area of effect, more powerful than the single target Arrows of Holy Smiting.

Arrows and Bolts of Poison Cloud
- Explodes in large poisonous cloud.

Arrows and Bolts of Fiery Oil
- Engulfs the target and the nearby ground with a flaming oil.

Arrows and Bolts of Fireball, Frostball, Shockball, or Forceball
- With a nice blast radius, these explosive arrows are always a great hit!

Arrows of Fireball, Frostball, or Shockball (Delayed blast - 4 and 8 second varieties)
- More powerful than their explosive cousins above, these arrows have a timed fuse. Fire the arrow into a wall or the ground (at a safe distance, of course) and have fun! Great for timing a patrol coming around the corner or into range. These explosions are much more powerful and will tend to knock anyone in the blast area down... or launch them up... [i]Note: these arrows must be fired into the ground or a wall[/i]

Arrows and Bolts of Fireball, Frostball, or Shockball (Proximity)
- Similar to their cousins above, these arrows have a proximity fuse and will explode when an enemy gets near.

Arrows and Bolts of Chain Fireball, Chain Frostball, and Chain Lightning Ball
- Among the Vaclav clan's favorites, these arrows' explosion will cause all affected targets to randomly explode in within a few seconds. More targets for more mayhem!

Arrows and Bolts of Magical Runes (Fire, Frost, Shock, Holy Wrath, and Poison Cloud)
- Why should mages have all of the fun? These arrows will place a magical rune upon impact and will explode when your enemies come near.

Arrows and Bolts of Light (30sec, 120sec, permanent durations)
- These arrows travel a little slower as they illuminate their path, leaving a magical lightsource where they impact.

Arrows and Bolts of Glow Dust
- Explodes and causes all affected targets to glow for 60secs (useful for fighting in the dark!)


[size=+1][u][b]Potions[/b][/u][/size]

Potion of Vaclav's Archery
- Temporarily increases your speed to draw a bow and fortifies marksmanship skill

Potion of Vaclav's Sniping
- Temporarily gives night vision, fortified marksmanship, and more silent movement

Moonsugar Ale
- A favorite at Vaclav family gatherings. Watch out for that initial kick!

Distillates of Frostbite Venom **
- Instructions on how to distill and concentrate common Frostbite Venom into something a bit more potent.

Distillates of Ice Wraith Essence **
- Instructions on how to distill and concentrate Ice Wraith Essence into something a bit more potent and useful.

[color=Aquamarine][i]** Note: Due to the complex nature of this ancient Valclav family recipe, you must have these instructions in your inventory when crafting.[/i][/color]


[size=+1][u][b]How do I acquire these wonderful toys?[/b][/u][/size]

Items may be purchased from Crazy Vaclav himself and his extended family. Members of the Vaclav clan may be found hanging out in the major inns in Whiterun, Markarth, Riften, and Solitude. You may also craft them yourself at any forge.


[size=+1][u][b]Known Incompatibilies[/b][/u][/size]

None


[size=+1][u][b]Check out my other mod(s)[/b][/u][/size]

[url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48869/?]More Interesting Loot for Skyrim[/url]
author: GhengisBob

files.name: CrazyVaclavsExplodingArrows_v4_1
files.changelogHtml:
Version History
-------------------------------------------------------

Version 4.1 (Dec 23, 2014)
- [New] added new Arrow and Bolt of Forceball (large explosion of pure force - very fun!).
- [Updated] changed Arrows of Fireball, Shockball, Frostball to damage the player if you are too close!
- [Updated] changed Arrows of Fireball, Shockball, Frostball (Delayed) to damage the player if you are too close!
- [Updated] changed Arrows of Fiery Oil to damage the player if you are too close!
- [Updated] changed Arrows of Poisonous Cloud to damage the player if you are too close!
- [Updated] readjusted the price of many of the arrows and bolts to be a bit more expensive.


Version 4.0 (Dec 7, 2014)
- [New] added new Bolts of numerous enchantments! Dawnguard DLC is now required.
- [New] added Arrows and Bolts of Fiery Oil.
- [New] added Arrows and Bolts of Poison Cloud.
- [Updated] Crazy Vaclav and his family now stock limited quantities of ammo.
- [Updated] Crazy Vaclav (Whiterun) will stock an assortment of Arrows and Bolts.
- [Updated] Brother Vaclav (Markarth) will stock an assortment of Bolts.
- [Updated] Sister Vaclav (Solitude) will stock an assortment of Arrows.
- [Updated] Uncle Vaclav (Riften) is addled by too much Moon Sugar and may or may not remember to stock Arrows and/or Bolts.
- [Updated] tweaked the gold value of many of the new ammo types.

Version 3.5 (Dec 3, 2014)
- This version is intended to be the final Vanilla (ie no DLC requirements) version
- A few minor tweaks on some of the effects
- Removed various unused records (old tests and experiments

Version 3.32 (Jul 20, 2014)
- Cleaned the Mod with TES5Edit

Version 3.31 (Jul 19, 2014)
- fixed a possible problem with Arrows of Glowdust

Version 3.30 (Feb 8, 2014)
- fixed a problem with Arrows of Runes (fire, etc) being too weak
- tweaked a few minor values in various items

Version 3.25 (Aug 4, 2013)
- adjusted/balanced many damage effects
- cleaned out lots of old test records

Version 3.2 (Apr 25, 2013)
- [new] added Arrow of Magical Rune (Holy Wrath)
- [new] added Arrows of Holy Smiting (Lesser, Greater)
- rebalanced a few prices and damage effects
- adjusted a few minor bugs with the Chain explosion arrows

Version 3.1 (Apr 14, 2013)
- divided out most single target arrows into Lesser and Greater varieties
- adjusted, updated, and fixed many visual effects

Version 3.0a (Apr 13, 2013)
- [new] added Magical Rune arrows (fire, shock, and frost)
- [new] added arrows of Chain Fireball, Chain Frostball, and Chain Lightningball
- fixed an issue where Frost effects would not slow the target
- updated a few explosive visual effects
- figured out how to use scripts with arrows, much more fun to come!

Version 2.2 (Dec 8, 2012)
- [new] added proximity versions of Fireball, Shockball, Frostball, and Poison Cloud
- fixed the delayed blast varieties; they got screwed up in v2.1

Version 2.1 (Dec 2, 2012)
- [new] added Arrow of Glow Dust

Version 2.0b
- adjusted damage of all items
- adjusted pricing of all items
- adjusted various explosive visual effects
- [new] added 3 new members of the Vaclav clan in Riften, Solitude, Markarth
- [new] added Arrows of Poison, Poison Cloud, Drain Life
- [new] added Rings of Fortify Speed, Night Vision, Quickshot, Illumination
- [new] added Potion of Vaclav's Sniping
- [new] added Moonsugar Ale
- [new] added book w/recipes to craft distilled and concentrated Frostbite Venom
- [new] added book w/recipes to craft distilled and concentrated Ice Wraith Essence

Version 1.51
- repacked the mod to fix a reported problem with the Nexus Mod Manager

Version 1.4
- updated the Arrow of Light; finally has a duration!
- added stagger effects to Arrows of Fireball and Shockball
- adjusted a few visual effects to be better
- fixed some sound problems with frost and shock explosions
- adjusted some prices up by a little bit

Version 1.3
- updated most of the explosive visual effects
- further refined the elemental effects
- added Arrows of Paralyzation (4s and 8s)
- added Arrow of Force
- adjusted damage and pricing
- adjusted recipes to be more balanced (more expensive components)

Version 1.2
- revamped pricing to be a bit more balanced
- revamped regular arrow damage to be inline with an Orcish arrow
- fixed some major problems with the magical effects damage (fire, frost, shock) simply not working
- updated most of the visuals to be better
- refined the blast area of effect for most arrows

Version 1.1
- added simple crafting at a forge (req steel smithing, some steel arrows, and a minor ingredient)
- fixed errors with the delayed shock arrows (they exploded on impact instead of being timed)
- adjusted some pricing
- adjusted the explosion radius to be slight larger

Version 1.0
- Initial release
